item.description:
The Hunters are powerful, beastly, necromantic weapons made by Black Sun. They are a deadly combination of strength, brutality, and supernatural speed.

Neutral Black Sun Prowler Undead - Lv. 35+
 Att 4 | Dam 5 | Def 9 | Arm 3 | LP: 20 | Res 10 | Mov 12/16 | AP 2/4
 Availability: Type-012s aren’t unique and you may include 1 for every 150 levels available to your party.
 Innate Ability: Damage Resistance
 Modified Claws and Jaws: Attack made by the Type-012 ignore 1 point of the targets Armor.
 Dead Eyes: The Type-012 gets +1 to its Seek rolls.
 Regeneration: The Type-012 recovers 3 Life Points at the beginning of each Recovery Phase.
 Primary Rabies: Whenever the Type-012 takes Damage, it must make an Uncontrollable check.
 Berserker: While out of control, the Type-012 gets +1 Attack and +1 Damage.
 ooo Coil (Ki, Charge)
 +2 Damage, This attack causes Throw. While the Type-012 is out of control, it will always use this Charge instead of the Basic Charge.
 
Type-012 Modifications
 A Type-012: Hunter may be given one of the following upgrades, increasing their basic Level by the amount noted:
 Type-012a Viper Levels: +5
 Whenever an attack made by the Type-012a deals damage, its target suffers Poison Lv. 2 Effect 17.
 Type-012b Deathseeker Levels: +5
 The Type-012b gets Open Movement and doesn’t require Line of Sight to declare a Charge against an enemy Unit.
 Type-012c Regenerating Levels: +5
 The Type-012c recover 6 LP instead of 3 at the beginning of each Recovery Phase.
 Type-013 Advance Hunter Levels: +10
 The Type-013 recovers an additional Action Point per turn, and no longer has the Primary Rabies ability.
 In addition to one of the above options, the Type-012 may also be given the following upgrade, increasing their basic Level by the amount noted:
 Final Protocol Levels: +5
 When the LP of the Type-012 reaches 0 or less, remove it from the game as normal and replace it with a marker the same size as it base. At the beginning of the next Action Phase, before any Character is activated, make an attack (6 ATT 6 DAM) that effects all Units within 3 inches of the marker. Remove the marker after the attack is resolved.
